title: A Kansas Homecoming
sub_head: This Medal of Honor winner was armed only with faith, love and courage.
body:
Not many of us will attract crowds of devoted fans seven decades after passing away. But this was no ordinary man. Roy Wenzl and Travis Heying of the Wichita Eagle report on Wednesdayâ€™s events:
The identification of the remains occurred recently, but thanks to President Barack Obama, many people learned all about this amazing story eight years ago. On April 11, 2013 Mr. Obama stood in the East Room of the White House and described an event that occurred at the end of the Korean War in 1953:
